text.section: A "person in the position of a seller" includes as against a principal an agent who has paid or become responsible for the price of goods on behalf of his principal or anyone who otherwise holds a security interest or other right in goods similar to that of a seller.
A person in the position of a seller may as provided in this title withhold or stop delivery (§ 2-705) and resell (§ 2-706) and recover incidental damages (§ 2-710).
